title: Where are the Akali changes
body:
I remember seeing a RED comment after all the akali nerfs and the E not procing Q change that said they`d be giving her a mini rework in the preseason. Mainly changing her kit around so that shes not so hard countered by a single pink ward but still possibly having vision if you enter her shroud physically.

Whatever happened to all those ideas? Just following up, any update is appreciated.

replies.body: We have been looking at Akali somewhat recently, with the focus being on reworking her kit to both give her better counterplay and abilities that are more distinct from other assassins (her W's currently really unique, rest of the kit not as much). Conclusion we've come to is that there's cool stuff that can be done, but that it makes more sense to bundle Akali changes with work on other assassins whenever we can look at the class as a whole. That won't be for a while at least (definitely not preseason or early 2016, might be quite a bit later depending on which bits of work get prioritized).

Off-topic but with all the Preseason and balance changes, [these are still in effect right?](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/vGdZE7Td-compendium-of-map-specific-champion-balance)
Just checked with ManWolfAxeBoss, those changes are indeed still in effect and we don't have any current plans to modify them.
You have a guy named "ManWolfAxeBoss" working at Riot?! Here, have an upvote.
Cool. Thank you ^^

Meddler, thanks for the answer.  Could you perhaps explain which assassins you guys are most likely to look at in a rework?  I mean irelia and Vi are listed as assassins, but I don't think I'd see either in an assassin rework.  Is it safe to assume it'd be more like champs such as evelynn, rengar, shaco, katarina, and khazix?

Now that I'm looking at it, many of your assassins (including teemo) have an invisibility aspect to theme.  Would this be a sneaky bastard group rework or the straight up charge at you and murder your face group rework?

We'd be looking at the primary assassins, rather than diving fighters with some assassin qualities (Irelia or Vi for example). We would like to look at diving fighters separately someday as well, that'd be a different piece of work with a different focus though.
Could you say if Evelynn or Kha'Zix might be on the list to be looked at?

Has making Twilight Shroud her ultimate in order to allocate more power budget to it been considered?

Talked about it, it's a spell we'd like to see used in lane pre 6 though. Assassins who get their full damage combo without having to use an ult with a meaningful CD have also traditionally been much harder to balance.

How would you feel about removing the cast time on Akali's W?  I've always felt the delay kinda irksome and having to stop briefly to put it down when you're chasing or running away can really screw you over.  I would think of it more as a QoL buff than a straight up buff and I don't think it would be gamebreaking.

There was time that you guys did tried that at v3.5 increasing Akali's ultimate CD to 35/25/15secs but then you guys half reverted it.

I know that downtime on spells are important, its the natural way to make a comeback and stops champions from becoming too snowbally.

If downtimes are that important then how come you guys couldn't just nerf her ult back to 35/25/15secs? (Simlar to what you guys did to Riven), Akali is in a pretty bad spot atm, if something like low downtime on her ultimate is stopping her from getting buffs then I wouldn't mind her ult have a higher downtime if she can get power elsewhere, so that Akali is playable in the meantime before for re-work comes out.

Since Akali wont be getting a rework for awhile are small QoL buffs on the table? 

Like when you use R or Q on someone it wont cancel her previously issued AA command and she will go right back into trying to AA after the spell finishes (so no need to double click mid combo helping it flow smoother with less misclicks mid fights) 

Or speeding up the missile speed on her Q ever so slightly so you don't have to wait that quarter of a second for your Q to connect before finishing a rotation which really makes her combo awkward in certain situations.

Small QoL's like these can really go a long way to hold us off till the assassin overhaul. Im not the most die hard Akali player but I think these things would help.
Not early 2016? Does that mean you've ruled them out for the next group to be worked on, or that you don't plan on doing another group rework until mid 2016?
Yeah, it's looking really unlikely we'll tackle assassins next. Whether we do a smaller class update earlier in 2016 or a larger one mid year's still being figured out.
How about a quality of life change in the mean time? Ideally i`d want to have her E proc Q again but even anything like improved speed % in shroud would be appreciated.

I do think there are two groups of assassins, honestly.
AP assassins,
AD caster assassins,
And some might argue crit assassins.

Each is a small class of its own, and I think it wouldn't really be fair to lump them all together as balance decisions that positively affect one don't necessarily positively affect the other.

A better question would when would you guys have time to look in Akali again in the short term? The last time she got changes was 5.9 and 5.10 was just a follow-up to the mess 5.9 created with her ult.

Its been long since then, so are there any plans to give Akali something in the meanwhile before her rework?

Her w is only really unique in that it's an invisible zone instead of a self applied invisibility. I always found her passive and ult to be more characteristic of her, as she likes to build both AD and AP. If you guys could somehow make her work as a hybrid assassin that keeps her W and R, I would really appreciate it. I really think there's a lot that can be done with her passive.

What if instead of her AP giving her bonus damage on her autos, it instead added and increased/AD scaling on her abilities?

And as for her W, what if we made it a zone that also interacted with her ultimate?

I would honestly love to give you some of my time to help develop akali. It would be great if we could make a kit that leaves both akali mains and the general public satisfied.

Furthermore, I've been an assassin main since early season 2, going so far as to try to play nearly any champion as an assassin (trust me assassin hecarim was legit).

I agree for the most part. While the W is unique, I don't think it really defines Akali. I think her two most important characteristics are:

1. Multiple dashes that reset on kill/assist - This makes her an incredible counter to high mobility champions  and one of the few champions you can't just Flash to escape.

2. Spellvamp. I like being able to take fights that look bad prima facie, but being able to heal up based on the damage done. It makes for some wonderfully surprising turnarounds.

The Akali rework was just in the early stages of it, so its not set in stone.

Its predicted that it will probably only come out like at the end of S6, which is a long way. They still have Poppy Urgot, Taric, Yorick and Shen etc to work on.

Everyone knows that Akali is in a long due for a rework because shes in a pretty bad spot atm, in the meantime Riot still need to add **healthy** power back to her kit because 5.9 obviously wasn't enough. What i mean by healthy power, is to buff Akali in a way that isn't going to make her problematic again, so avoid giving suggestions such as damage buff, cast time removals or making spells more easier to use. 

My suggestions at first is to re-look into the strike-through that they added 5.9, perhaps make it more potent, or reduce the melee strike-through range to be a flat 100, I honestly don't like it how to pushes you out of AA range at 200.

Second Suggestion is to buff the movement speed boost on Akali's W that was introduced at 4.18, the movement speed boost was left undertuned on purpose at lvl1 because she still had E being able to proc Q and 800 ult range, now that they are both gone they should add some power back into her ms boost on shroud at early ranks because it is really underwhelming. The Initial amount when it first hit PBE was 60/70/80/90/100% but then they reduced it  too much to the one on live 20/40/60/80/100%.
